<MembersIndexItem

  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-mipsconstantislandpass-cpp-/mipsconstantislands">MipsConstantIslands</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-mipsconstantislandpass-cpp-/mipsconstantislands">MipsConstantIslands</a> - Due to limited PC-relative displacements, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mips">Mips</a> requires constant pool entries to be scattered among the instructions inside a function. <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-mipsconstantislandpass-cpp-/mipsconstantislands/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-mipsconstantislandpass-cpp-/mipsconstantislands/basicblockinfo">BasicBlockInfo</a></>}>
<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/basicblockinfo">BasicBlockInfo</a> - Information about the offset and size of a single basic block. <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-mipsconstantislandpass-cpp-/mipsconstantislands/basicblockinfo/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-mipsconstantislandpass-cpp-/mipsconstantislands/cpuser">CPUser</a></>}>
CPUser - One user of a constant pool, keeping the machine instruction pointer, the constant pool being referenced, and the max displacement allowed from the instruction to the CP. <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-mipsconstantislandpass-cpp-/mipsconstantislands/cpuser/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-mipsconstantislandpass-cpp-/mipsconstantislands/cpentry">CPEntry</a></>}>
CPEntry - One per constant pool entry, keeping the machine instruction pointer, the constpool index, and the number of CPUser&#39;s which reference this entry. <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-mipsconstantislandpass-cpp-/mipsconstantislands/cpentry/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-mipsconstantislandpass-cpp-/mipsconstantislands/immbranch">ImmBranch</a></>}>
ImmBranch - One per immediate branch, keeping the machine instruction pointer, conditional or unconditional, the max displacement, and (if isCond is true) the corresponding unconditional branch opcode. <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-mipsconstantislandpass-cpp-/mipsconstantislands/immbranch/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<ProgramListing>

<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===- MipsConstantIslandPass.cpp - Emit Pc Relative loads ----------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass is used to make Pc relative loads of constants.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For now, only Mips16 will use this.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loading constants inline is expensive on Mips16 and it&#39;s in general better</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to place the constant nearby in code space and then it can be loaded with a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// simple 16 bit load instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The constants can be not just numbers but addresses of functions and labels.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This can be particularly helpful in static relocation mode for embedded</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non-linux targets.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132" lineLink="#a4ed70b091d984638ade40c36b700db3a"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a4ed70b091d984638ade40c36b700db3a">branchMaxOffsets</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Opcode) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Bits, Scale;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Opcode) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// MipsConstantIslands - Due to limited PC-relative displacements, Mips</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// requires constant pool entries to be scattered among the instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// inside a function.  To do this, it completely ignores the normal LLVM</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// constant pool; instead, it places constants wherever it feels like with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// special instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The terminology used in this pass includes:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   Islands - Clumps of constants placed in the function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   Water   - Potential places where an island could be formed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///   CPE     - A constant pool entry that has been placed somewhere, which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///             tracks a list of users.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-mipsconstantislandpass-cpp-/mipsconstantislands"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-mipsconstantislandpass-cpp-/mipsconstantislands/#aa5de99ed1dd179bee53f782e65658825">MipsConstantIslands</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunctionpass/#a29c81d2386f4a727c6d33413807530c8">MachineFunctionPass</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// BasicBlockInfo - Information about the offset and size of a single</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// basic block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">BasicBlockInfo &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      /// Offset - Distance from the beginning of the function to the beginning</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      /// of this basic block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      /// Offsets are computed assuming worst case padding before an aligned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      /// block. This means that subtracting basic block offsets always gives a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      /// conservative estimate of the real distance which may be smaller.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      /// Because worst case padding is used, the computed offset of an aligned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      /// block may not actually be aligned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      /// Size - Size of the basic block in bytes.  If the block contains</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      /// inline assembly, this is a worst case estimate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      /// The size does not include any alignment padding whether from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      /// beginning of the block, or from an aligned jump table at the end.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BasicBlockInfo() = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">default</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> postOffset()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::vector&lt;BasicBlockInfo&gt; BBInfo;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// WaterList - A sorted list of basic blocks where islands could be placed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// (i.e. blocks that don&#39;t fall through to the following block, due</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// to a return, unreachable, or unconditional branch).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::vector&lt;MachineBasicBlock&#42;&gt; WaterList;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// NewWaterList - The subset of WaterList that was created since the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// previous iteration by inserting unconditional branches.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallset">SmallSet&lt;MachineBasicBlock&#42;, 4&gt;</a> NewWaterList;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">water&#95;iterator = std::vector&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;&gt;::iterator;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// CPUser - One user of a constant pool, keeping the machine instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// pointer, the constant pool being referenced, and the max displacement</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// allowed from the instruction to the CP.  The HighWaterMark records the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// highest basic block where a new CPEntry can be placed.  To ensure this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// pass terminates, the CP entries are initially placed at the end of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// function and then move monotonically to lower addresses.  The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// exception to this rule is when the current CP entry for a particular</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// CPUser is out of range, but there is another CP entry for the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// constant value in range.  We want to use the existing in-range CP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// entry, but if it later moves out of range, the search for new water</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// should resume where it left off.  The HighWaterMark is used to record</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">    /// that point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight">CPUser &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;CPEMI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;HighWaterMark;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with different displacements</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LongFormOpcode;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">      CPUser(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;mi, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;cpemi, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> maxdisp,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad137f00752c91478230b01c851768605">neg</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">        : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>(mi), CPEMI(cpemi), MaxDisp(maxdisp),</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">        HighWaterMark = CPEMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a1e855100f407ca4be098d0050be403b0">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      /// getMaxDisp - Returns the maximum displacement supported by MI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> getMaxDisp()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Order the entries in BB by descending alignment.  That ensures correct</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// alignment of all entries as long as BB is sufficiently aligned.  Keep</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// track of the insertion point for each alignment.  We are going to bucket</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a17e04afcf0c5efeb0eb6a9a45287b5e4">BuildMI</a>(&#42;BB, InsAt, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dwarf-linker/#a463a58e257d5f6fb2c39eb9a2474fc24ac2e06fc138163b7095fa483616a0a47a">DebugLoc</a>(), TII-&gt;get(Mips::CONSTPOOL&#95;ENTRY))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CPEMIs.push&#95;back(CPEMI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ensure that future entries with higher alignment get inserted before</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CPEMI. This is bucket sort with iterators.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> a = LogAlign + 1; a &lt;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad82de9da62635df78a534de0f16c1129">Log2</a>(MaxAlign); ++a)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add a new CPEntry, but no corresponding CPUser yet.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CPEntries.emplace&#95;back(1, CPEntry(CPEMI, i));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++NumCPEs;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Moved CPI#&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; i &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; to end of function, size = &quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// BBHasFallthrough - Return true if the specified basic block can fallthrough</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// into the block immediately after it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586" lineLink="#a2591f82337ce78f51703e6b3382eec3c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a2591f82337ce78f51703e6b3382eec3c">BBHasFallthrough</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get the next machine basic block in the function.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlight">          UOpc=Mips::Bimm16;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Bits = 8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Scale = 2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><span class="doxyHighlight">          isCond = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Mips::BtnezX16:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Record this immediate branch.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxOffs = ((1 &lt;&lt; (Bits-1))-1) &#42; Scale;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ImmBranches.push&#95;back(ImmBranch(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, MaxOffs, isCond, UOpc));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MO.isCPI()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We found one.  The addressing mode tells us the max displacement</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from the PC that this instruction permits.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There doesn&#39;t seem to be meaningful DebugInfo available; this doesn&#39;t</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Update the CFG.  All succs of OrigBB are now succs of NewBB.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Next, update WaterList.  Specifically, we need to add OrigMBB as having</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// available water after it (but not if it&#39;s already there, which happens</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Figure out how large the OrigBB is.  As the first half of the original</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block, it cannot contain a tablejump.  The size includes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the new jump we added.  (It should be possible to do this without</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-mipsconstantislandpass-cpp-/mipsconstantislands/#a77b47e627bb837517308b9541f97f6b5">computeBlockSize</a>(OrigBB);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// isOffsetInRange - Checks whether UserOffset (the location of a constant pool</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UserOffset &lt;= TrialOffset) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TrialOffset - UserOffset &lt;= MaxDisp)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// isWaterInRange - Returns true if a CPE placed after the specified</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Water (a basic block) will be in range for the specific MI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Compute how much the function will grow by inserting a CPE after Water.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = U.CPEMI-&gt;getOperand(2).getImm();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CPEEnd = CPEOffset + <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The CPE may be able to hide in the alignment padding before the next</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block. It may also cause more padding to be required if it is more aligned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that the next block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CPEEnd &gt; NextBlockOffset) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Growth = CPEEnd - NextBlockOffset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the padding that would go at the end of the CPE to align the next</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Growth += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a99cdcecbadc13087f087c61809bb44f1">offsetToAlignment</a>(CPEEnd, NextBlockAlignment);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the CPE is to be inserted before the instruction, that will raise</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the offset of the instruction. Also account for unknown alignment padding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in blocks between CPE and the user.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CPEOffset &lt; UserOffset)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="956"><span class="doxyHighlight">      UserOffset += Growth;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CPE fits in existing padding.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="959"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Growth = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="960"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="961"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-mipsconstantislandpass-cpp-/mipsconstantislands/#af8551cd00faa264bb137701056f6f3d0">isOffsetInRange</a>(UserOffset, CPEOffset, U);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="962"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="963"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// To ensure that this pass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// terminates, the CPE location for a particular CPUser is only allowed to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// move to a lower address, so search backward from the end of the list and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// prefer the first water that is in range.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1160" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-mipsconstantislandpass-cpp-/mipsconstantislands/#a909a324ed32517aaca69fb2e87f41bca"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-mipsconstantislandpass-cpp-/mipsconstantislands/#a909a324ed32517aaca69fb2e87f41bca">MipsConstantIslands::findAvailableWater</a>(CPUser &amp;U, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UserOffset,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if water is in range and is either at a lower address than the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1170"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// current &quot;high water mark&quot; or a new water block that was created since</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1171"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the previous iteration by inserting an unconditional branch.  In the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1172"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// latter case, we want to allow resetting the high water mark back to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1173"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this new water since we haven&#39;t seen it before.  Inserting branches</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// should be relatively uncommon and when it does happen, we want to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sure to take advantage of it for all the CPEs near that block, so that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we don&#39;t insert more branches than necessary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1177"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Growth;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1178"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-mipsconstantislandpass-cpp-/mipsconstantislands/#a54ee101062ec8079d8d7fadafb29c511">isWaterInRange</a>(UserOffset, WaterBB, U, Growth) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1179"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (WaterBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a3aa22d521bd6a7e6b9f35545dc7b0f1e">getNumber</a>() &lt; U.HighWaterMark-&gt;getNumber() ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1180"><span class="doxyHighlight">         NewWaterList.count(WaterBB)) &amp;&amp; Growth &lt; BestGrowth) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1181"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is the least amount of required padding seen so far.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1182"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BestGrowth = Growth;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1183"><span class="doxyHighlight">      WaterIter = IP;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1184"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Found water after &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af7881286e3ea4d7f1c4a63c87c132dac">printMBBReference</a>(&#42;WaterBB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1185"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; Growth=&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Growth &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1186"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1187"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep looking unless it is perfect.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1188"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BestGrowth == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1189"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IP == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1195"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1196"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1197"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// createNewWater - No existing WaterList entry will work for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// CPUsers&#91;CPUserIndex&#93;, so create a place to put the CPE.  The end of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// block is used if in range, and the conditional branch munged so control</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// flow is correct.  Otherwise the block is split to create a hole with an</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1286"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reused within the block, but it doesn&#39;t matter much.  Also assume CPEs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1287"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are added in order with alignment padding.  We may eventually be able</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1313"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (result==1) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1323"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1324"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the original WaterList entry was &quot;new water&quot; on this iteration,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1342"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1352"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1355"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1356"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1357"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remove the original WaterList entry; we want subsequent insertions in</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1515"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1516"><span class="doxyHighlight">    DestBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a8cb665c210dc8e43f537cf4c9b84e2c7">setAlignment</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a>(4));</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1548"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1549"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add an unconditional branch to the destination and invert the branch</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1550"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// condition to jump over it:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1551"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bteqz L1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1552"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// =&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1553"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bnez L2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1554"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// b   L1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1555"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// L2:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1556"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1557"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the branch is at the end of its MBB and that has a fall-through block,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1558"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// direct the updated conditional branch to the fall-through block. Otherwise,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1559"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// split the MBB before the next instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1560"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getParent();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1564"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1565"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ++NumCBrFixed;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1566"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BMI != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1567"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (std::next(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>)) == std::prev(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;end()) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1568"><span class="doxyHighlight">        BMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a91c590e8191655a6739eb4df9c443896">isUnconditionalBranch</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1569"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Last MI in the BB is an unconditional branch. Can we simply invert the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1570"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// condition and swap destinations:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1571"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// beqz L1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1572"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// b   L2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1573"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// =&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1574"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bnez L2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1575"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// b   L1</span></CodeLine>
